name: Search for the Bacon Pasta
description:
Just a game I'm working on about my friends, hopefully funny and fun to play. But I don't know yet because I haven't started very much yet lol. Thanks for checking out my game hope you enjoy it!

The Demo is just temporary for now and will not be in the final game, It is just a test to see what I can do until there is more story.

Also if you would like to help with art or story writing please DM me @ Timmy#2611

Last thing. If you like making music or just like listing to original music, you should join my discord!

https://discord.gg/Qusz4DH

Version Log

-V.0.0

Demo

-V.0.1

added restart option back to beginning

added cover image

-V.0.2

Fixed minor spelling errors

worked on story, Chapter 1. ~20% complete {Not In Demo}

Do to my laptop blue screening :( I've had to restart. Luckily I have an amazing friend who is helping me with the script and the lore. Thank you Ethan!

Demo Soon!
